title: First Steps with CockroachDB
description: This course teaches practical first steps with CockroachDB.

courses.title: Start an Insecure Single-Node Cluster
courses.description: Spin up a single-node cluster and access its DB Console.

courses.title: Connect with the SQL shell
courses.description: Connect the built-in SQL shell to a running cluster.

courses.title: Create and Modify Tables
courses.description: Create and modify tables using the built-in SQL shell.
